entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h near noon. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 28 this morning and minus 20 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 06:00 AM AST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 20. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 06:00 AM AST Sunday 22 January 2023
